Extensions.​render

Extension functions for the render library.

Functions
DrawCylinder
function render.DrawCylinder(
pos,
ang,
height,
radius1,
radius2,
steps,
color
)

Draws a cylinder at a specified point using <primitive.Cylinder>.

Parameters
Vector pos

The position to draw the cylinder at.

Angle ang

The angle to draw the cylinder at.

number height

The height of the cylinder. A negative value will make it cylinder render inside out.

number radius1

The radius of the bottom face of the cylinder. A value of 0 removes the face entirely.

number radius2

The radius of the top face of the cylinder. A value of 0 removes the face entirely.

number steps

The amount of steps. This controls the quality of the cylinder. Higher values will lower performance significantly.

Color? color

The color to draw the cylinder with. Default: color_white

DrawWorldText
function render.DrawWorldText(
pos,
text,
noz
)

Draws a piece of text at a certain point in 3D space.

Parameters
Vector pos

The position to draw the text at.

string text

The text to draw.

bool? noz

Whether to render through walls. Default: false

DrawSpotlight
function render.DrawSpotlight(
pos,
ang,
length,
radius,
color,
pixvis
)

Draws a spotlight similar to the one produced by point_spotlight.

Parameters
Vector pos

The position to draw the spotlight at.

Angle ang

The angle to draw the spotlight at.

number length

The length of the beam part of the spotlight.

number radius

The radius of the spotlight.

Color color

The color of the spotlight.

pixelvis_handle_t pixvis

The PixVis handle.
